hero.title: About Momai Brass
hero.subtitle: Engineering Precision Since 1993
hero.description: Momai Brass has been a pioneering precision components manufacturer for three decades, delivering high-quality metal parts to diverse industrial sectors. Our commitment to technological excellence and precision engineering sets us apart in the manufacturing landscape.

meta.title: Momai Brass - Precision Manufacturing Excellence Since 1993
meta.description: Leading precision components manufacturer with 30 years of experience, specializing in CNC machining for automotive, pneumatic, and hydraulic industries.

companyJourney.title: Our Journey
companyJourney.subtitle: Three Decades of Continuous Growth and Innovation

items.content: Momai Brass is a leading precision components manufacturer with 30 years of expertise in producing high-quality metal parts for automotive, pneumatic, hydraulic, and electrical sectors. Our state-of-the-art CNC manufacturing capabilities and commitment to technological innovation have positioned us as a trusted partner for industries demanding exceptional precision and quality.
